item.title: Android EditTextä¿®æ”¹hintæ–‡å­—å¤§å°
item.description:
å¯æ˜¯å­Ÿå©†å¥¹æ–­äº†æˆ‘çš„æ¡¥ã€‚

éœ€æ±‚ï¼šEditTextçš„å­—ä½“å¤§å°18spï¼Œhintæ–‡æœ¬å­—ä½“å¤§å°ä¸º10spã€‚

EditTextè®¾ç½®hintæ–‡æœ¬çš„sizeã€‚ç”±äºæ²¡æœ‰ç›¸å…³å±æ€§ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ SpannableString å»å®ç°ã€‚

Googleå®˜æ–¹æ˜¯å¦è€ƒè™‘å‡ºä¸€ç»„hintå­—ä½“ç›¸å…³çš„å±æ€§å‘¢ï¼Ÿæ¯”å¦‚ hintSize,hintColor è¿™äº›ã€‚

å…ˆçœ‹æ•ˆæœå›¾ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œandroid:textSize=â€18spâ€ï¼Œä¸ºå‡¸æ˜¾æ•ˆæœï¼ŒåªæŠŠ hint æ–‡æœ¬å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºäº† 10spã€‚


å›¾1:è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œå­—ä½“å¤§å°18spã€‚

å›¾2:hintæ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å‰åŠéƒ¨åˆ†å­—ä½“å¤§å°ä¸º10spã€‚


Kotlin ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/et"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:textSize="18sp"
        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent"
        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

import android.os.Bundle
import android.text.SpannableString
import android.text.Spanned
import android.text.SpannedString
import android.text.style.AbsoluteSizeSpan
import android.widget.EditText
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
        val editText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.et)
        customHint(editText, "æˆ‘æ˜¯hintæ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œ10spã€‚ç§‹é£çŸ¥æˆ‘æ„ï¼Œå¾®å‡‰åˆæ·±æƒ…ã€‚")
    }

    /**
     * è®¾ç½®EditTextä¸­Hintå­—ä½“å¤§å°
     * @param editText
     * @param hintString
     */
    fun customHint(et: EditText, hintString: String) {
        //è®¾ç½®å­—ä½“å¤§å°
        val textSize = AbsoluteSizeSpan(10, true)

        val spannableString = SpannableString(hintString)
        spannableString.setSpan(
            textSize,
            0,
            hintString.length / 2,//æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œï¼Œä¸ºäº†æ•ˆæœæ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œåªè®¾ç½®äº†æ–‡æœ¬çš„ä¸€åŠ
            Spanned.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_EXCLUSIVE
        )
        et.hint = SpannedString(spannableString)
    }
}








è½¬è½½è¯·æ³¨æ˜ï¼šåŠ‰æ¸…æšçš„åšå®¢ Â» Android EditTextä¿®æ”¹hintæ–‡å­—å¤§å°

MainActivity.ktï¼š



package com.moon.exportexcelfile

import android.os.Bundle
import android.os.Environment
import android.util.Log
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.TextView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import java.io.File
import java.util.*

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)
        //æ˜¾ç¤ºå­˜å‚¨è·¯å¾„
        val textView = findViewById<TextView>(R.id.textView)
        //å¯¼å‡ºæŒ‰é”®
        findViewById<Button>(R.id.btn).setOnClickListener {
            val file = creatFile()
            ExcelUtils.writeDataToExcel(file, getData())
            Toast.makeText(this, "åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            Log.i("lq ", " ok")
            textView.text = "æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•ä¸º  " + file.absolutePath
        }
    }
    /**
     * åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæœ¬åœ°å­˜å‚¨è·¯å¾„
     * /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.moon.exportexcelfile/files/Documents/export.xls
     */
    private fun creatFile(): File {
        val file =
            File(this.getExternalFilesDir(Environment.DIRECTORY_DOCUMENTS)?.absolutePath + File.separator + "export.xls")

        Log.i("lq ", " file == " + file.absolutePath)
        return file
    }
    /**
     * ç”Ÿæˆ 20è¡Œ8åˆ— æ•°æ®ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸ºè¡¨å¤´
     */
    private fun getData(): ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> {
        val list = ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>()
        for (j in 1..20) {
            val listRow = ArrayList<String>()
            for (i in 1..8) {
                if (j == 1) {
                    //æ·»åŠ è¡¨å¤´
                    listRow.add("è¡¨å¤´ $i ")
                } else {
                    listRow.add("$j è¡Œ-$i åˆ—")
                }
            }
            list.add(listRow)
        }
        Log.i("lq ", " list == $list")
        return list
    }

}

å·¥å…·ç±» ExcelUtils.ktï¼š



package com.moon.exportexcelfile

import android.util.Log
import jxl.Workbook
import jxl.write.Label
import jxl.write.WritableCellFormat
import jxl.write.WritableFont
import java.io.File

/**
 *
 *@author : lq
 *@date   : 2021/6/17
 *@desc   : åœ¨æŒ‡å®šå…¨è·¯å¾„çš„ Excelè¡¨ä¸­å†™å…¥æ•°æ®
 *
 */
object ExcelUtils {
    //è¡¨å¤´æ ·å¼
    private lateinit var tableFormat: WritableCellFormat
    init {
        Log.i("lq ", "ExcelUtils init")
        format()
    }
    /**
     * excel æ ·å¼è®¾ç½®
     */
    private fun format() {
        val tableFont1 = WritableFont(WritableFont.ARIAL, 11, WritableFont.BOLD)//11å·å­—ï¼ŒåŠ ç²—
//        tableFont1.colour = jxl.format.Colour.LIGHT_BLUE // å¯è®¾ç½®é¢œè‰²

        tableFormat = WritableCellFormat(tableFont1)
        tableFormat.alignment = jxl.format.Alignment.CENTRE // è¡¨æ ¼æ•°æ®å±…ä¸­æ˜¾ç¤º
        tableFormat.setBorder(jxl.format.Border.ALL, jxl.format.BorderLineStyle.THIN)
        tableFormat.setBackground(jxl.format.Colour.GRAY_25)//è¡¨æ ¼æ·»åŠ èƒŒæ™¯é¢œè‰²
    }

    /**
     * å†™å…¥æ•°æ®åˆ°Excelä¸­
     * file  æ‰€åˆ›å»ºçš„Excelæ–‡ä»¶  /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.moon.exportexcelfile/files/Documents/export.xls
     * list  æ•°æ®é›†åˆ j è¡Œ i åˆ—
     */
    fun writeDataToExcel(file: File, list: ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>) {

        if (list.isEmpty() || list.size == 0) {
            return
        }
        if (file.exists()) {
            Log.i("lq ", " æ–‡ä»¶å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ é™¤é‡å»º")
            file.delete()
        }
        file.createNewFile()
        var workbook = Workbook.createWorkbook(file)
        try {
            //ä¸€å¼  execl è¡¨å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¾ˆå¤šè¡¨å•ï¼ˆsheetï¼‰ï¼Œé»˜è®¤æœ‰3ä¸ªï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸€å¼ è¡¨å•åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®
            val sheet = workbook.createSheet("è¡¨å•1", 0)

            for (j in list.indices) {

                var listRow = list[j]

                for (i in listRow.indices) {
                    if (j == 0) {
                        //ä¸ºè¡¨å¤´æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼
                        sheet.addCell(Label(i, j, listRow[i], tableFormat))
                    } else {
                        sheet.addCell(Label(i, j, listRow[i]))
                    }

                    //æ ¹æ®æ•°æ®é•¿åº¦è®¾ç½®åˆé€‚åˆ—å®½
                    if (listRow[i].length <= 5) {
                        sheet.setColumnView(i, listRow[i].length + 8)
                    } else {
                        sheet.setColumnView(i, listRow[i].length + 5)
                    }
                }

                //è®¾ç½®è¡Œé«˜
                sheet.setRowView(j, 350)

            }
            workbook.write()
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            e.printStackTrace()
        } finally {
            workbook?.close()
        }
    }

}

  <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>

æ–°å¢ FileUtils.kt å·¥å…·ç±»ï¼Œä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹

package com.moon.exportexcelfile

import android.content.Context
import android.content.Intent
import android.net.Uri
import android.os.Build
import android.util.Log
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.core.content.FileProvider
import java.io.File
import java.util.*

/**
 *
 *@author : lq
 *@date   : 5/10/21
 *@desc   : æ–‡ä»¶æ‰“å¼€å·¥å…·ç±»
 *
 */
class FileUtils {

    private var mContext: Context

    constructor(mContext: Context) {
        this.mContext = mContext
    }

    /**å£°æ˜å„ç§ç±»å‹æ–‡ä»¶çš„dataType */
    private val DATA_TYPE_ALL = "*/*" //æœªæŒ‡å®šæ˜ç¡®çš„æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ç²¾ç¡®ç±»å‹çš„å·¥å…·æ‰“å¼€ï¼Œéœ€è¦ç”¨æˆ·é€‰æ‹©

    private val DATA_TYPE_APK = "application/vnd.android.package-archive"
    private val DATA_TYPE_VIDEO = "video/*"
    private val DATA_TYPE_AUDIO = "audio/*"
    private val DATA_TYPE_HTML = "text/html"
    private val DATA_TYPE_IMAGE = "image/*"
    private val DATA_TYPE_PPT = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint"
    private val DATA_TYPE_EXCEL = "application/vnd.ms-excel"
    private val DATA_TYPE_WORD = "application/msword"
    private val DATA_TYPE_CHM = "application/x-chm"
    private val DATA_TYPE_TXT = "text/plain"
    private val DATA_TYPE_PDF = "application/pdf"

    /**
     * äº§ç”Ÿé™¤äº†è§†é¢‘ã€éŸ³é¢‘ã€ç½‘é¡µæ–‡ä»¶å¤–ï¼Œæ‰“å¼€å…¶ä»–ç±»å‹æ–‡ä»¶çš„Intent
     * @param filePath æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
     * @param dataType æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
     * @return
     */
    private fun generateCommonIntent(
        filePath: String,
        dataType: String
    ): Intent? {
        val intent = Intent()
        intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK)
        intent.setAction(Intent.ACTION_VIEW)
        val file = File(filePath)
        val uri = getUri(intent, file)
        intent.setDataAndType(uri, dataType)
        return intent
    }


    /**
     * äº§ç”Ÿæ‰“å¼€è§†é¢‘æˆ–éŸ³é¢‘çš„Intent
     * @param filePath æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
     * @param dataType æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
     * @return
     */
    private fun generateVideoAudioIntent(
        filePath: String,
        dataType: String
    ): Intent? {
        val intent =
            Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW)
        intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TOP)
        intent.putExtra("oneshot", 0)
        intent.putExtra("configchange", 0)
        val file = File(filePath)
        intent.setDataAndType(getUri(intent, file), dataType)
        return intent
    }

    /**
     * äº§ç”Ÿæ‰“å¼€ç½‘é¡µæ–‡ä»¶çš„Intent
     * @param filePath æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
     * @return
     */
    private fun generateHtmlFileIntent(filePath: String): Intent? {
        val uri = Uri.parse(filePath)
            .buildUpon()
            .encodedAuthority("com.android.htmlfileprovider")
            .scheme("content")
            .encodedPath(filePath)
            .build()
        val intent =
            Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW)
        intent.setDataAndType(uri, DATA_TYPE_HTML)
        return intent
    }

    /**
     * è·å–å¯¹åº”æ–‡ä»¶çš„Uri
     * @param intent ç›¸åº”çš„Intent
     * @param file æ–‡ä»¶å¯¹è±¡
     * @return
     */
    private fun getUri(intent: Intent, file: File): Uri? {
        var uri: Uri? = null
        if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.N) {
            //åˆ¤æ–­ç‰ˆæœ¬æ˜¯å¦åœ¨7.0ä»¥ä¸Š
            uri = FileProvider.getUriForFile(
                mContext, mContext.getPackageName().toString() + ".fileprovider",
                file
            )
            //æ·»åŠ è¿™ä¸€å¥è¡¨ç¤ºå¯¹ç›®æ ‡åº”ç”¨ä¸´æ—¶æˆæƒè¯¥Uriæ‰€ä»£è¡¨çš„æ–‡ä»¶
            intent.addFlags(Intent.FLAG_GRANT_READ_URI_PERMISSION)
        } else {
            uri = Uri.fromFile(file)
        }
        return uri
    }

    /**
     * æ‰“å¼€æ–‡ä»¶
     * @param filePath æ–‡ä»¶çš„å…¨è·¯å¾„ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶å
     */
    fun openFile(filePath: String) {
        Log.i("lq", "æ‰“å¼€æ–‡ä»¶ == $filePath")
        val file = File(filePath)
        if (!file.exists()) {
            //å¦‚æœæ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨
            Toast.makeText(mContext, "æ–‡ä»¶æ‰“å¼€å¤±è´¥ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶å·²ç»è¢«ç§»åŠ¨æˆ–è€…åˆ é™¤", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
            return
        }
        /* å–å¾—æ‰©å±•å */
        val end =
            file.name.substring(file.name.lastIndexOf(".") + 1, file.name.length)
                .toLowerCase(Locale.getDefault())
        /* ä¾æ‰©å±•åçš„ç±»å‹å†³å®šMimeType */
        var intent: Intent? = null
        if (end == "m4a" || end == "mp3" || end == "mid" || end == "xmf" || end == "ogg" || end == "wav") {
            intent = generateVideoAudioIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_AUDIO)
        } else if (end == "3gp" || end == "mp4") {
            intent = generateVideoAudioIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_VIDEO)
        } else if (end == "jpg" || end == "gif" || end == "png" || end == "jpeg" || end == "bmp") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_IMAGE)
        } else if (end == "apk") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_APK)
        } else if (end == "html" || end == "htm") {
            intent = generateHtmlFileIntent(filePath)
        } else if (end == "ppt") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_PPT)
        } else if (end == "xls" || end == "xlsx") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_EXCEL)
        } else if (end == "doc" || end == "docx") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_WORD)
        } else if (end == "pdf") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_PDF)
        } else if (end == "chm") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_CHM)
        } else if (end == "txt") {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_TXT)
        } else {
            intent = generateCommonIntent(filePath, DATA_TYPE_ALL)
        }
        try {
            mContext.startActivity(intent)
        } catch (e: Exception) {
            e.printStackTrace()
            Toast.makeText(mContext, "æœªæ‰¾åˆ°å¯ä»¥æ‰“å¼€æ–‡ä»¶çš„è½¯ä»¶", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }

    }
}

Java ä»£ç ä½¿ç”¨ èŒƒå‹T çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œåœ¨Kotlinä»£ç ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶ï¼ŒæŠ¥é”™ ï¼š Cast expression adapter to Nothing

item.title: è§‚ éŸ©å‰§ã€Šè¯·å›ç­”1988ã€‹ æœ‰æ„Ÿ
item.description:
æˆ‘ä¸ä¼šåƒä½ ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚ç»å¯¹ä¸ä¼šäº†ã€‚




å½“æœ‰äººå°†è§‚åæ„Ÿå½“ä½œæ¯•ä¸šè®ºæ–‡å†™æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘çŸ¥é“ä»–å·²ç»èµ¢äº†ã€‚å¦‚ä½•è¯„ä»·ç”µè§†å‰§ã€Šè¯·å›ç­”1988ã€‹ï¼Ÿ

å½“é˜¿æ³½åœ¨ä¼—äººé¢å‰è¯´å–œæ¬¢å¾·å–„çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ­£å…«å°±å·²ç»è¾“äº†ã€‚

ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥æ„ŸåŠ¨çš„ä¸è¦ä¸è¦çš„ï¼Œæ˜¯å› ä¸ºä»–æœ€èƒ½æ„ŸåŒèº«å—å§ï¼Œæœ€èƒ½æ¥è¿‘ç°å®å§ï¼Œæœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„å½±å­å§ã€‚

å½“å†æ¬¡å›åˆ°å‡¤å‡°å ‚èƒ¡åŒä¹‹æ—¶ï¼Œå°±å¦‚åŒæµé€çš„å²æœˆèˆ¬ï¼Œèƒ¡åŒä¹Ÿä¸Šäº†å¹´å²ã€‚ä½†æ— è®ºæ˜¯æˆ‘çš„é’æ˜¥è¿˜æ˜¯è¿™æ¡èƒ¡åŒï¼Œå†ä¹Ÿæ— æ³•å›åˆ°è¿‡å»äº†ã€‚  

å²æœˆä¾ç„¶æµé€ï¼Œä¸€åˆ‡ç»ˆå°†è¿‡å»ï¼Œå¹´å²æ¸é•¿ï¼Œé’æ˜¥ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥ç¾ä¸½ï¼Œææ€•è¿™å°±æ˜¯åŸå› ã€‚åœ¨åˆ¹é‚£çš„ç¬é—´è€€çœ¼é—ªçƒä¹‹åï¼Œå†ä¹Ÿæ— æ³•å›å»ï¼Œæ¶Œå‡ºçœ¼æ³ªçš„é’æ¶©å²æœˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä¹Ÿæœ‰è¿‡â€¦è¿™ç§é’æ˜¥ã€‚
